This is a Flashcab Comment !  In this comment list there are claims of Free Movie Downloads. "TOTALLY FREE" . "BULLSHIT". Anyone that thinks that, is stupid !! The both sites mentioned , both wants your email address , one wants a joining fee and the other wants you to sign up to receive promotional material and merchandise offers via your email. So if you do not buy anything they can sell off your email address to the highest bidding Spammer. Even the one that asks for a joining fee will do this to cover costs.  The only true free way to download your movies is P2P and yes if you are on a shaped ADSL plan , your cost is your bandwith when you exceed your allotted download threshold. There is a old saying , "There is no free lunches in this world" , but file sharing is the best way to go and costs the less. So wise up Brothers and Sisters beware of the too good to be true offers they are all too often a rip off ...... At your expense.........
